Player History
Drafted in 25th round, 400th overall pick, by Detroit in 2015...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/5/2015, off Agustin Vega (SF)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/6/2015, off Ryan Miller (ATL)...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis (B) on 2/14/2016 to a 2-year deal worth $750,000 per year...
Won World Series with St. Louis (B) in 2016...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis (C) on 2/3/2018 to a 2-year deal worth $3,500,000 per year...
Injured on 8/4/2018 with a Broken Ribs, out for 2-3 weeks...
Injured on 7/25/2019 with a Broken Hand, out for 4-5 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Brooklyn on 2/16/2020 to a 2-year deal worth $2,270,000 per year...
Injured on 4/27/2020 with a Concussion, out for 1-2 weeks...
